name: Awesome & Adventure Hiking trip in Rainforest Country.
description:
They can enjoy the max in the rainforest as Malaysia is recognize as a rainforest country which is full of flora & fauna, mossy forest, historical story and many more.

Join this trip may know a lot of friends in different level from different background. You may have the chance to learn some jungle survivor skills.

Besides, you will be given the opportunity to have some interaction with the local people in Malaysia and learn about their culture, lifestyle, living style. But this is only upon request and with additional charges.
